edutrack:
The system aims to provide an integrated, automated platform for creating and managing university study schedules, including: 
• Entering program and course data. 
• Managing faculty and instructor data. 
• Registering students and study subjects. 
• Creating study schedules manually or with the help of an engine, creating optimized schedules while reducing conflicts and improving resource allocation. 
• Manage and track student attendance to exams by generating QR codes that are scanned by students, with attendance data automatically linked to the student’s course record. The system includes data entry and management: 
• University, colleges, and study programs. 
• Study regulations and study materials. 
• Classrooms, their types, and available times. 
• Faculty members and instructors. 
• Student course records. 
• Creating study schedules manually or using artificial intelligence. 
• Viewing and analyzing lecture attendance. 
It provides various user interfaces for students, faculty members, and programs and colleges.
educrat: This project involves building a web-based platform that connects influencers with users for custom content, collaborations, and promotions. The system will include user and influencer management, secure payment processing, and protected content storage and delivery. An admin dashboard will handle platform monitoring, analytics, and management tools. The platform will be fully responsive, optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop, and designed for high performance and usability.
